patthana21.35:1.1: Nahetu naajjhatto dhammo hetussa ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava, purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.35:2.1: Nahetu nabahiddhā dhammo hetussa bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava, purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
